title: Frontend Developer Intern
description: Collaborate with UI/UX designers to implement visually appealing web pages using React and Tailwind CSS. Assist in converting Figma designs into responsive HTML/CSS templates. Debug and test user interface elements across major browsers and devices. Support the integration of REST APIs and manage state using Redux or Context API.
requirements: Knowledge of React, HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript. Basic understanding of RESTful services. Experience with Git and version control workflow.

title: Backend Developer Intern
location: Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates AE
description: Assist in building RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express. Support database operations and schema design using MongoDB and PostgreSQL. Contribute to server-side application logic and middlewares. Monitor performance and assist with load testing and optimizations.
requirements: Understanding of REST principles and API development. Familiarity with MongoDB, Express, and SQL databases. Basic experience with backend frameworks and tools.

title: Mobile App Developer Intern
description: Develop cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter and Dart. Participate in app testing and debugging on Android and iOS devices. Work closely with designers to ensure brand and UI consistency. Integrate third-party APIs and services (e.g., Firebase, payment gateways).
requirements: Familiarity with mobile app architecture (Flutter/React Native). Basic knowledge of mobile app lifecycle and deployment. Experience with JSON, API integration, and Git.

title: Cybersecurity Intern
description: Assist in performing vulnerability assessments and penetration tests. Monitor and log suspicious network activity. Help develop and enforce security protocols for company systems. Document findings and assist in preparing security audit reports.
requirements: Basic knowledge of cybersecurity principles and tools (e.g., Wireshark, Kali Linux). Understanding of network protocols and firewalls. Strong attention to detail and problem-solving skills.

title: Data Analyst Intern
description: Analyze data using Python libraries (Pandas, NumPy) and create visualizations in Power BI. Support the team in creating dashboards and KPIs. Help interpret large datasets for decision-making and optimization. Assist in ETL processes and data cleaning.
requirements: Experience with data analysis tools (Python, Excel). Basic knowledge of SQL for data querying. Strong analytical thinking and curiosity to explore data trends.
